title: [League Client Update] Will I still be able to play ranked?
body: If I join and update my client to the Alpha version, will I still be able to play Ranked and start from where I left off in the old client? Will I also be able to play with friends who haven't updated their clients yet?

replies.body: The answer to the first question is yes; for the second question I have to say, yes.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=Qsw60tO5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-19T21:06:20.774+0000)
>
> The answer to the first question is yes; for the second question I have to say, yes.

Thank you very much!
